CompanyDigest a company digest supporting personal tax is newsworthy

CompanyDigest a company digest with open invoices counts them

CompanyDigest a company digest with open invoices is newsworthy
CompanyDigest a company digest user with insights is expected to equal true
CompanyDigest a company digest user with insights insights are seen is expected to equal false

CompanyDigest a company digest with unbilled timeslips sums the native costs
CompanyDigest a company digest with unbilled timeslips is newsworthy
CompanyDigest a company digest with sent estimates counts them

CompanyDigest a company digest with sent estimates is newsworthy
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items without admin todo items todo statuses is empty
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items without admin todo items returns todo statuses count
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items without admin todo items isn't newsworthy
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items with 'undone' admin todo items todo statuses size is 1
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items with 'undone' admin todo items todo statuses count is 1
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items with 'undone' admin todo items is newsworthy
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items with 'done' admin todo items todo statuses is empty
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items with 'done' admin todo items todo statuses count is 0
CompanyDigest a company digest admin todo items with 'done' admin todo items isn't newsworthy

examples.description: Given the current date is 2020-03-01 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And it has the following bank accounts: -> Given the cashflow_include_net_salary_and_bonuses_payments feature is enabled -> And the company has the following CashflowTest bank transactions: -> Then the balance in 90 days will be calculated as '952.00'
examples.full_description: Salary Calculations Project salary payments forward which recur once a month for three months Given the current date is 2020-03-01 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And it has the following bank accounts: -> Given the cashflow_include_net_salary_and_bonuses_payments feature is enabled -> And the company has the following CashflowTest bank transactions: -> Then the balance in 90 days will be calculated as '952.00'

examples.description: Given the current date is 2020-03-01 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And it has the following bank accounts: -> Given the cashflow_include_net_salary_and_bonuses_payments feature is enabled -> And the company has the following CashflowTest bank transactions: -> Then the balance in 90 days will be calculated as '982.00'
examples.full_description: Salary Calculations Do NOT project salary payments forward which recur more than once a month Given the current date is 2020-03-01 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And it has the following bank accounts: -> Given the cashflow_include_net_salary_and_bonuses_payments feature is enabled -> And the company has the following CashflowTest bank transactions: -> Then the balance in 90 days will be calculated as '982.00'

Cashflow::Payment::WebHosting behaves like Recurring payment #excluded? when no override is not excluded
Cashflow::Payment::WebHosting behaves like Recurring payment #excluded? when override for specific payment when override included is not excluded
Cashflow::Payment::WebHosting behaves like Recurring payment #excluded? when override for specific payment when override excluded is excluded

Cashflow::Payment::WebHosting behaves like Recurring payment #excluded? when override for payments from source item when line item due date is before override from_date when override included is not excluded

Cashflow::Payment::WebHosting behaves like Recurring payment #excluded? when override for payments from source item when line item due date is before override from_date when override excluded is not excluded

Cashflow::Payment::WebHosting behaves like Recurring payment #excluded? when override for payments from source item when line item due date is same as override from_date when override excluded is excluded
